attributes.action: Introduction of US style bounty hunters in the uk under an SIA style licence
attributes.additional_details:
To bring in a US style of bounty hunter with an SIA style licence in to the UK to save thousands of hours of police time & money.

Properly licenced individuals & companies would have access to certain databases and information about certain individuals that have warrants issues for their arrest.

This would make our streets safer, it would generate jobs but mostly it would free up our Police staff to do their jobs properly without the need for endless reems of paperwork.

A new department could be set-up under the non-goverment departmental section there fore no new civil servant jobs would be created.

They could work hand in hand with other agencies in the UK.
